data.persona: I grow a beard and shave it off.  I pee standing up.  I hunt and gather for my village.  I made my own crossbow.
data.description:
You are in the Riverbed.
With clear air and the sound of gurgling water near it, the river bed is silty and muddy. The river rushes by the land as more and more dirt separates from the land. The land of the riverbed slick with mud and filled with bugs and worms/
There's a dirt, a clear air, a water, a worm, a fish, a boat, a river, a the land, a mud, a gurgling water, and an a basket here.
The villager is here.

You are carrying nothing.

            "extra_desc": "The riverbed is where the village people come to collect water to drink. The women come early in the morning with their baskets to collect water for the whole family. data.short_motivation: I want to hug the villager to pull them out of the mud and gurgling waterhole.
data.mid_motivation: I need to pull the villager out to save them from drowning.
data.long_motivation: After saving this villager, they will owe me a life debt, and I can visit their home at any time and expect hospitality, ale and good food.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
